articles.author: Lexi Lonas
articles.title: EU, Australia trade talks halted after submarine deal controversy with France | TheHill - The Hill
articles.description: The European Union is halting its trade talks with Australia after the country dropped its submarine deal with France for a deal with the U.S., causing high tensions among the countries.
articles.content:
The European Union is halting its trade talks with Australia after the country dropped its submarine deal with France for a deal with the U.S., causing high tensions among the countries.
